Constructor Detail

SimpleSSLPinningWebViewClient

public SimpleSSLPinningWebViewClient(int[] keyHashes)
Creates a WebViewClient using custom TrustManager to pin the expected SSL certificate.

Parameters:
keyHashes - Accepted certificate hashes provided as an int array.

SimpleSSLPinningWebViewClient

public SimpleSSLPinningWebViewClient(java.lang.String[] keyHashes)
Creates a WebViewClient using custom TrustManager to pin the expected SSL certificate.

Parameters:
keyHashes - Accepted certificate hashes provided as a String array.

onPageFinished

public void onPageFinished(android.webkit.WebView view,

When the page is loaded check the SSL certificate. If it was not the correct one alert the listners.

public void addWrongCertificateListener(WrongSSLCertificateListener listener)
